shows.title: Hooking Up
shows.blurb: A great dramedy. A man diagnosed with cancer and a sex columnist fired from her job, take a road trip that forces them to get intimate with their issues, as well as each other.

shows.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
shows.blurb: Dev Patel delves into the mind of a brilliant Indian mathematician in this intriguing biographical drama, following the amazing life of a pioneer in his field.

shows.title: Snow White's New Adventure
shows.blurb: Snow White returns in this family animation. A young girl in search for her father discovers Snow White and the Dwarfs' hidden cottage, sending them on another adventure.

shows.title: Smallfoot
shows.blurb: An all-star cast lends their voices to this charming animation. A fun and friendly Yeti's world is turned upside down when he finds something he didn't know existed: humans.

shows.title: Elf Pets: A Fox Cub's Christmas Tale
shows.blurb: A festive animated adventure set against the backdrop of the Northern Lights. Scout Elf Newsey Noel investigates how Santa Claus travels all around the world in a single night.

shows.title: The Jungle Bunch
shows.blurb: Quirky animated adventure. A gang of misfit animals head off on a mission to protect their jungle home from an evil koala.

shows.title: The House Of Magic
shows.blurb: This animated animal adventure for the whole family sees an abandoned young cat seek shelter in the house of a magician. Needless to say there's plenty of adventure to be had.

shows.title: Ballerina
shows.blurb: Wholesome animated adventure for the whole family. An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees to Paris, where she becomes a pupil at the Grand Opera house.

shows.title: Stardog & Turbocat
shows.blurb: A star-studded superhero animation. An astronaut dog mysteriously gains powers and ends up in a future where animals are hated. He finds a sidekick and works on a way to get home.

shows.title: Charming
shows.blurb: A perfectly charming animated adventure. When his father, the king, gives him an ultimatum, a young prince goes in search of true love.

shows.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
shows.blurb: Chris Pratt and an all-star cast return for this sequel. This time Emmet and the gang find themselves going on a space adventure when they are invaded by the Lego Duplo.

shows.title: Grand-Daddy Day Care
shows.blurb: In a comedy full of seniors - but only one adult - things go haywire when a family man turns his house into a 'daycare' centre for senior citizens.

shows.title: Dirty Dancing 2: Havana Nights
shows.blurb: Like the 1980s classic, this film is filled with dance and an added Latin flavour as an American girl and her family move to Cuba where she meets a local boy and discovers love.

shows.title: That's My Boy
shows.blurb: A man who was a lousy father, learns his son is getting married. Invite or not, he decides to visit and reconnect with his son on the eve of the wedding, with some awkward consequences.

shows.title: Changeland
shows.blurb: A film about friendship and re-discovering yourself. After finding out that his wife is having an affair, a man goes on his anniversary trip to Thailand with his estranged friend.

shows.title: Everybody Wants Some!!
shows.blurb: Iconic director Richard Linklater returns with a fun but deceptively deep coming-of-age film set in the 80s. This film follows a group of college friends and their antics.

shows.title: Beirut
shows.blurb: Jon Hamm is caught between a rock and a hard place in this action drama, when CIA operatives ask a former US diplomat to return to the field to help negotiate the release of a friend.

shows.title: 12 Strong
shows.blurb: Gritty war drama starring Chris Hemsworth. In the wake of the September 11 attacks, a US Special Forces team enter Afghanistan for an extremely dangerous mission.

shows.title: I Feel Pretty
shows.blurb: Amy Schumer brings the laughs in this rowdy comedy. A woman with self-esteem issues suffers a concussion and wakes up believing that she's the most beautiful woman on the planet.

shows.title: Fantaghirò In The Quest For The Kuorum
shows.blurb: A magical animated adventure about love and courage. A princess goes on a journey to save the world from an evil darkness.

shows.title: The Mighty Macs
shows.blurb: Carla Gugino (Sin City) stars in this sports drama. A woman coaches basketball team at an all-girls Catholic college. Without any resources she tries to get them to a championship.

shows.title: Heidi
shows.blurb: The classic tale of a brave girl is re-made in all its splendour. An orphan is sent to the Swiss Alps to live with her grandfather.

shows.title: Housesitter
shows.blurb: A con artist moves into an empty house, telling all the neighbours that she is married to the owner. When the owner finds out, he decides to play along.

shows.title: Sgt. Bilko
shows.blurb: Comedy heavyweight Steve Martin, plays a carefree soldier who's more interested in the good life and making a quick buck. But all that ends when a real soldier arrives on the base.

shows.title: Drillbit Taylor
shows.blurb: Three high school kids hire an unemployed, down on his luck, self-professed martial arts expert as a bodyguard to protect them from the school bullies.

shows.title: The Petal Pushers
shows.blurb: Murder moves to the suburbs in this dark comedy. After the death of their mother, two sisters suspect their stepdad, but their investigation leads them into bigger trouble.

shows.title: Segfault
shows.blurb: In this gripping action thriller, a woman becomes increasingly aware of her fractured past as a corrupt organisation begins to close in on her.

shows.title: Catwoman
shows.blurb: Halle Berry shows off her skills in this fantasy film, based on the comic book character. An ordinary woman inherits cat-like abilities, and is quickly drawn into a world of crime.

shows.title: Interrogation
shows.blurb: WWE stars Adam Copeland and C.J. Perry take on a terrorist mastermind in this thriller. The pair must race against time to uncover the villain's plan and save the city.

shows.title: 15 Minutes
shows.blurb: Oscar-winner Robert De Niro and Edward Burns (Alex Cross) team up for this crime thriller. Two New York detectives hunt down a pair of murderers seeking fame for their actions.

shows.title: Holiday Heist
shows.blurb: A crime thriller filled with danger and romance. A man released from prison is torn between a life of crime and a fresh start with a woman he meets.

shows.title: No Escape
shows.blurb: Owen Wilson and Pierce Brosnan must fight against all odds in order to survive in this intense thriller. A family are caught in the middle of a coup and must escape to safety.
Timing is everything in this supernatural thriller. A man's life is completely derailed when an ominous pattern of events starts repeating itself every day

shows.title: Kill Switch
shows.blurb: Dan Stevens fights to save the Earth in this pulsating sci-fi. When an experiment to produce unlimited energy goes wrong, a pilot tries and save his family and the world.

shows.title: Tangent Room
shows.blurb: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller. Trapped in a mysterious room with no escape, four brilliant minds race against time to prevent a cosmic collapse of the universe.

shows.title: The Circle
shows.blurb: Emma Watson stars in this disturbing sci-fi thriller. A young woman lands her dream job at a powerful tech company, but soon uncovers a deadly agenda that will affect all of humanity.

shows.title: Absolute Deception
shows.blurb: A widowed reporter seeks the help of a federal agent to investigate her husband's secrets, but they soon become targets.

shows.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
shows.blurb: This horror movie is driven by mystery and suspense. After being in an accident, a woman wakes up to find herself in a bunker with a man who claims to have saved her life.

shows.title: Ford V Ferrari
shows.blurb: In this history inspired film, Matt Damon and Christian Bale pair as Carroll Shelby and Ken Miles respectively to build a Ford racecar that will end Ferrari's reign in motorsport.

shows.title: Terminator: Genisys
shows.blurb: Arnold Schwarzenegger returns for this Terminator instalment. Fighters are sent back in time to protect Sarah Connor but are met with unexpected complications to the timeline.

shows.title: Under Siege
shows.blurb: As an ex-Navy turned chef, Steven Seagal uses his martial arts skills to retaliate after a Battleship is hijacked by terrorists who intend to use nuclear weapons on board.

shows.title: Glass Jaw
shows.blurb: A boxing flick about redemption. After being arrested at the peak of his career, a one-time boxing champ returns from jail to redeem his reputation, his belt, and his true love.

shows.title: Widows
shows.blurb: Oscar-winner Viola Davis leads an ensemble cast in this blistering thriller. Four women are brought together by the death of their criminal husbands - who left behind one last job.

shows.title: All About the Benjamins
shows.blurb: Ice Cube and Mike Epps chase the money in this comedy. When a bail-jumper discovers $20 million in stolen diamonds, he and the bounty hunter chasing him team up to steal them.
